about.headline: About Me

about.preview: With 19 years of experience teaching yoga, I focus on personalized practices that help you connect body and mind.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.quote: Yoga is not about touching your toes, it's about what you learn on the way down.
philosophy.description: I believe in a mindful approach to yoga, focusing on the individual needs of each practitioner.

testimonials.title: What My Students Say
testimonials.quote1: Classes with Olena changed my attitude towards yoga. It's not just exercises, but real work with yourself.
testimonials.quote2: 19 years of experience is felt in every movement, every tip. Professional of the highest level.
